What a fascinating question!
The origin of life on Earth is a fascinating and still somewhat mysterious topic.
Scientists have proposed several theories, the most widely accepted being the "Primordial Soup Hypothesis" or "RNA World Hypothesis."

While we don't have all the answers, The scientific community has pieced together various theories based on evidence from fields like astrobiology, (the study of the potential for life beyond Earth), geology, In order to understand how life might have emerged,.
